entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Prince Albert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 07:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -34.2°C
Wind: W 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
